sentences.en: After Georgetown, Kit went into the Marine Corps, then became an international banker.
sentences.cn: 从乔治敦大学毕业后, 基特加入了海军陆战队, 后来成了一位国际银行家.

sentences.en: Buchanan was suspended for a year from Georgetown University after brawling with police.
sentences.cn: 布坎南因与警察发生肢体冲突而被乔治敦大学停学一年。

sentences.en: Charles Deacon is the dean of admissions at Georgetown University in Washington, D . C.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯迪肯是华盛顿乔治镇大学招生办主任.

sentences.en: Charles Dixon Deacon is the dean of admissions at Georgetown University in Washington, D . C .
sentences.cn: CharlesDeacon是华盛顿 特区 乔治敦大学入学处的主任.

sentences.en: Clinton was graduated from Georgetown University and in 1968 won a Rhodes Scholarship to Oxford University.
sentences.cn: 克林顿从乔治城大学毕业.1968年,他获得罗得斯奖金去牛津大学.

sentences.en: I thought you'd be taking the summer courses at Georgetown University.
sentences.cn: 我以为你在乔治敦大学读暑期班呢.

sentences.en: In 1815, President James Madison signed a bill granting Georgetown a charter to confer degrees.
sentences.cn: 1815年, 詹姆斯.麦迪逊总统签署了一项法令,批准乔治敦大学拥有学位授予权.

sentences.en: Kyle decided on Georgetown, and I was going to Duke.
sentences.cn: 凯尔决定上乔治敦大学, 而我则决定去上杜克大学.

sentences.en: Major Cities: Georgetown, Linden, New Amsterdam, Corriverton.
sentences.cn: 主要城市: 乔治敦 、 林登 、 新阿姆斯特丹 、 科里弗顿.

sentences.en: Washington, July 16, Georgetown, also came together in the design scheme is selected as Jefferson.
sentences.cn: 7月16日, 华盛顿也来到乔治镇,于次日召集杰弗逊等人选定设计方案.

phrases.tran_cn: 乔治城大学（位于美国首都华盛顿特区）

trans.tran_cn: 乔治敦（圭亚那首都； 开曼群岛<英>首府； 美国华盛顿哥伦比亚特区内的住宅区）
